Package com.epimorphics.lda.sources

The sources package contains classes that interface between Elda and the different kinds of RDF/SPARQL data sources available.

Interface Summary
AuthMap.NamesAndValues  
Source Abstraction of the data endpoint to be queried.
Source.ResultSetConsumer The callback object used for SELECTs.

AuthMap  
CombinedSource A combined source is a way of composing data from different endpoints.
GetDataSource  
HereSource A Source that pulls its data from the supplied model (which typically will be the model that the endpoint resource was taken from).
LocalSource Data source which represents an in-memory model loaded from a local file.
Source.Util

SparqlSource Data source representing and external SPARQL endpoint.

SparqlSource.Perhaps  
 

Package com.epimorphics.lda.sources Description

The sources package contains classes that interface between Elda and the different kinds of RDF/SPARQL data sources available. Sources may be connected to files, TDB datasets, SPARQL endpoints, or data pulled directly from the API configuration.
